intro: Stenostomum radiatum, commonly known as the radiate stenostomum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Pacific Islands. The plant produces small, yellowish to orange flowers arranged in dense, spherical clusters. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and have a rough, hairy texture. Stenostomum radiatum is often found growing in disturbed soils and along roadsides, showing adaptability to various environmental conditions.
